translation.en: [man] Hey, you girls like that?
translation.zh: 姑娘们 你们喜欢吗？

translation.en: You're gonna like it?
I want to do new stuff tonight.
translation.zh: 我今晚想说点新鲜的梗

translation.en: There's a stag dude in the back that keeps shouting "minge" every five minutes.
translation.zh: 后面有个男的独自来的 他每隔五分钟喊一次“女阴”

translation.en: Just get on, get off.
translation.zh: 你就上去表演 结束后就下来

translation.en: Do what you gotta do, yeah?
-[man] You guys have been absolutely... -That girl's here again.
[man 2] That was Jack Barry.
[man 2 laughs] How's everyone feeling? You good?
-[crowd cheers] Yeah! -[man 2] Are you ready for the next act?
translation.zh: -大家感觉如何？还好吗？ -好！ 准备好看下一个表演了吗？

translation.en: -[crowd] Whoo! -[man 2] Yes! Fantastic.
Now, she's a good friend of mine.
She's become a permanent fixture on my sofa bed recently,
translation.zh: 最近成为了我家沙发床的永久性装饰

translation.en: but she doesn't pay any fucking rent, so she needs your support.
translation.zh: 但她一毛钱房租都不给我 所以她需要你们的支持

translation.en: Please give it up
for Mae Martin!
-[audience cheering] -[Mae] Thanks, man.
[clears throat] Hi, guys.
I'm Mae.
Um, did everyone have a good childhood?
I'm from Canada.
I came over in a canoe recently with Celine Dion.
translation.zh: 最近跟席琳狄翁一起划独木舟 过来的

translation.en: She was at the helm.
Um, I'm recently single. Is anybody single? Give me a cheer.
translation.zh: 我最近是单身 下面有谁单身吗？ 回应我一下

translation.en: [Mae] Yeah. And it's fine. I'm doing fine. I'm catching up on my reading.
translation.zh: 这没什么的 我很好 我最近一直在读东西

translation.en: Just reading my ex's Facebook page.
-[audience laughing] -That's all that I read.
I feel weird recently.
Um, I don't know. The only way I can describe it is like,
translation.zh: 我说不好 我只能这样描述一下

translation.en: I feel like I'm full of birds.
translation.zh: 我觉得自己体内都是鸟

translation.en: Um, not like hummingbirds, like I'm anxious,
translation.zh: 不是那种让人焦虑的蜂鸟

translation.en: but like pelicans?
Like very greasy pelicans
in my chest.
I don't know if you've ever seen a photo after an oil spill and the beach is just,
translation.zh: 不知道你们有没有看到过 石油泄漏后的照片 整个海滩

translation.en: there's all these birds and they're covered in oil
translation.zh: 海滩上全是浑身沾满了石油的鸟

translation.en: and they can't lift their wings, they're like... [gags]
translation.zh: 它们抬不起翅膀 反正…

translation.en: They're in my chest.
translation.zh: 我心里感觉塞满了这种鸟

translation.en: Thank you, one person, for laughing.
translation.zh: 太感谢你了 只有你笑了

translation.en: Can you tell your friend I'm gonna flush her phone down the toilet
translation.zh: 能不能告诉你朋友 我会把她手机丢马桶里冲走

translation.en: if she doesn't stop texting?
-Sorry. -Who are you texting?
I'm not texting, I'm playing Candy Crush.
translation.zh: 我没在发信息 我在玩糖果大爆险

translation.en: [Mae] No, that's fine. That's absolutely fine.
translation.zh: 没事 没关系 真的没事

translation.en: It's very important that I stay humble, so...
translation.zh: 我最好还是谦逊一点 所以…

translation.en: Did my mother hire you?
[man] Minge!
-See? That's funny! -That's really funny.
translation.zh: -听见没？真好笑！ -真是太好笑了

translation.en: -God, I love that! -Mmm.
translation.zh: 老天 我好爱脱口秀！ 是

translation.en: It just makes you think, like, everything is perspective.
translation.zh: 这让我会觉得 万事万物都蕴含着观点

translation.en: -Mmm. -You know? Like, okay,
I look at this and I see a pint glass, right? But you might see some...
translation.zh: 它在我眼里就是个品脱杯 对吧？ 但你可能看到的是…

translation.en: hazelnuts.
-Okay? And we wouldn't even know. -[man chuckles]
translation.zh: 好吗？我们甚至都想不到

translation.en: Hey. Have I ever told you my story about ham?
translation.zh: 我跟你说过我那个火腿的故事吗？

translation.en: -No. -You're gonna love it. [laughs]
Hold that thought. Just gonna go and get my Tupperware from the cloakroom.
translation.zh: 稍等片刻 我去衣帽寄放处 把自己的特百惠杯子拿来

translation.en: Okay.
[woman] George, why did you drag us here?
translation.zh: 乔治 你为什么拽我们来这里？

translation.en: I literally hate comedy. It's so embarrassing.
translation.zh: 我真的很讨厌喜剧 刚才我好难为情

translation.en: That girl was so rude to me.
Binky, you were on your phone all the way through her set.
translation.zh: 宾琪 她表演的时候你一直在玩手机

translation.en: I know. I'm so bad!
translation.zh: 我知道 我这人太糟糕了！

translation.en: -Binks. -Hmm?
What did you tell Jared?
-Oh, I told him that you fancy him. -Oh.
-Jesus! Why did you do that? -Because you haven't been with anyone
translation.zh: -老天！你干吗那么做？ -因为你自从跟安德鲁分手后

translation.en: since Andrew. That's five years ago.
translation.zh: 就再也没谈过恋爱 都五年了

translation.en: Your vagina's gonna seal up.
It's about this big. It's got coleslaw in it.
translation.zh: 大概有这么大 里面包着凉拌菜丝

translation.en: No?
All right, let's go. The car's outside.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们走吧 车在外面

translation.en: You know, actually,
I think I'm gonna walk.
Yeah. I'm gonna go to the bathroom too, so you guys go.
translation.zh: 对 我还得去趟洗手间 你们先走吧

translation.en: -Yeah. Bye. -Okay.
Bye.
No.
Can I get a double gin and tonic, please?
translation.zh: 能给我来一杯双份金汤力吗？

translation.en: Aw, man. That was hard work.
-That girl was laughing though. -[Mae] What?
-Nah, come on. -Why not?
I mean, have you seen her? She's like England's Rose.
translation.zh: 你没看到她吗？她就像英伦玫瑰一样

translation.en: And I'm like a kernel of corn that somebody glued onto some sticks.
translation.zh: 不行 我就像被别人 粘到棍子上的玉米粒

translation.en: -[chuckles] -She's like a dangerous Mary Poppins.
translation.zh: 她就像危险的玛丽波平斯

translation.en: I'm like Bart Simpson.
That's funny.
-What should I do, go talk to her or what? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我该怎么办 去找她搭讪吗？ -对啊

translation.en: I mean, she's been here, like, three times, only laughing at your stuff.
translation.zh: 她来了三次 每次都只会被你的梗逗笑

translation.en: And your stuff is bad.
Thank you.
-What's the worst that could happen? -Oh, uh, humiliation, loneliness...
translation.zh: -最差能怎样呢？ -就是… 羞辱、孤独、抑郁、悔恨

translation.en: -[George] Hello? -...depression, regret.
-Hi. -Hi.
-Hi. -Hi.
Oh, sorry, you're busy-- Yeah.
I just wanted to say sorry about my friend.
translation.zh: 我就是想替我朋友道个歉

translation.en: -So, sorry. -No, fine. How are-- Who are you?
translation.zh: -对不起了 -不 没关系 你怎么…你叫什么名字？

translation.en: -I'm George. -Hi.
-Yeah. -Hi.
[giggles] Hi.
-Do you understand the rules of this game? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你明白这游戏的规则了吧？ -明白了

translation.en: It's very straightforward. Okay. How old are you?
translation.zh: 非常简单 好了 你多大?

translation.en: -Twenty-nine. -When did you lose your virginity?
translation.zh: -29岁 -什么时候失去处女之身的？

translation.en: -Um, just yesterday. -Yesterday?
-What's your favorite film? -Coyote Ugly.
translation.zh: -你最喜欢的电影是什么？ -《女狼俱乐部》

translation.en: -Coyote Ugly? That's not true. -Oh, no.
Okay. Okay, my turn. Um...
[clears throat] How long have you been in England?
-Two years. -Okay.
-Favorite member of the Beatles? -Brian.
translation.zh: -甲壳虫乐队里你最喜欢谁？ -布莱恩

translation.en: Are we on a date?
I-- I don't know.
Are we?
-I don't know. I'm asking you. -Well, I don't know.
translation.zh: -我不知道 我在问你啊 -我也不知道

translation.en: Do you wanna be on a date? Why are we fighting right now?
translation.zh: 你想跟人约会吗？ 我们为何争论这个？

translation.en: Right. [clears throat]
-I'm going home. What's your plan? -Um...
translation.zh: 我要回家了 你有什么安排？

translation.en: I-- I'm gonna stay out for a bit.
So, should I pull out the sofa bed or...?
translation.zh: 那我要不要把沙发床撑好 还是…

translation.en: I don't know, man.
Okay, well, do you have your key?
translation.zh: 好吧 那你有钥匙吗？

translation.en: I'm in the middle of a very riveting conversation, Nick.
translation.zh: 尼克 我正在进行一场 引人入胜的谈话

translation.en: So, maybe I'll text you later.
translation.zh: 或许我等下给你发信息

translation.en: Right.
I'll see you in... six months? Hmm?
Enjoy your date.
-[laughs] -Wow.
-He said it was a date. -Yeah.
-So I guess it is. -Mmm.
I've never been on a date with a girl before.
translation.zh: 我之前从未跟女生约会过

translation.en: Yeah.
Oh, no. Absolutely.
-Yeah. Okay. -Yeah, no. No. Yeah.
translation.zh: -是的 好的 -对 不 对

translation.en: So then would say that you've ever kissed a girl?
Yeah. I mean, yeah. I'm not a Mormon.
translation.zh: 亲过 毕竟我不是摩门教徒

translation.en: -Oh, okay. -Yeah.
That's a shame 'cause I exclusively date Mormons.
translation.zh: 真可惜 因为我只跟摩门教徒约会

translation.en: Oh.
Well...
-Do you like films? -Do you wanna kiss me, Mae?
translation.zh: -你喜欢看电影吗？ -你想亲我吗 梅？

translation.en: Oh... yeah. Yeah.
-Yeah. -Yeah?
That would be so cool.
-Now? -Yes.
Well, anyways--
-[Phil] Whoa! -[George] Oh my God, Phil! Christ!
translation.zh: -天啊！ -我的天 菲尔！我的老天！

translation.en: Can you, like, wear tap shoes or something?
translation.zh: 你能穿双走路有声的鞋吗？

translation.en: Sorry, Mae. This is my flatmate. I found him online.
translation.zh: 抱歉 梅 这是跟我合租公寓的室友 是我在网上找到的

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
Mae was just gonna help me arrange my shoes.
[Mae] Are you okay?
-I have depression. -[Mae] Oh, I'm sorry.
Okay. Thank you, Phil.
translation.zh: 好了 谢谢你 菲尔

translation.en: -Mae, my shoes are upstairs. -Okay.
translation.zh: -梅 我的鞋都在楼上 -好的

translation.en: Yeah, so this is my room.
translation.zh: 对 这就是我的房间

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah, yeah.
Oh my God! No!
What? No!
[Mae] No.
Can you turn off that music, please? And stop touching my hand, please.
translation.zh: 你能关掉音乐吗？ 还有 别再摸我的手了

translation.en: [Mae] George. Georgina.
Excuse me?
Can you wake up, please?
Wait, what? Wait, what's happening? Why are you over there?
translation.zh: 等一下 怎么了？等一下 怎么回事？ 你怎么在那？

translation.en: I couldn't sleep. I'm too pumped.
translation.zh: 我睡不着 我太紧张了

translation.en: I went out and went for a walk. I got you two coffees,
translation.zh: 我出去走了走 给你买了两杯咖啡

translation.en: like, a lottery ticket, and some Bombay mix.
translation.zh: 一张彩票和一包兵豆花生香味什锦

translation.en: And, while you were sleeping,
I painted a very beautiful portrait of you,
translation.zh: 我给你画了一幅美丽的肖像图

translation.en: as, like, a moving-in gift.
translation.zh: 算是我搬过来送你的礼物

translation.en: Yeah, so what do you wanna do today? You wanna go to IKEA?
translation.zh: 你今天想做什么？想去宜家吗？

translation.en: A very big day for us.
Can you just lie on top of me and tell me something Canadian?
translation.zh: 你能不能躺在我身上 跟我讲讲加拿大的事

translation.en: On July 1st, 1867,
the provinces of New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, and Canada
translation.zh: 新不伦瑞克省 新斯科舍省和加拿大省

translation.en: were declared the Dominion of Canada,
translation.zh: 宣布成立加拿大自治领

translation.en: with John A. Macdonald its first prime minister.
translation.zh: 约翰A麦克唐纳担任第一任首相

translation.en: Wow.
-Oh, my. This is a masterpiece. -I know.
translation.zh: -我的天 你画得真好 -我知道

translation.en: Oh, fuck. I didn't get you any presents.
translation.zh: 该死 我都没给你准备什么礼物

translation.en: Excuse me? I don't need presents.
translation.zh: 你说什么？我不需要礼物

translation.en: It's the greatest gift of my life
translation.zh: 我能跟戴安娜王妃天天做爱

translation.en: that I get to have sex with goddamn Princess Diana every day.
translation.zh: 就是我这辈子最大的福气了

translation.en: Okay.
-I'm gonna make today really good. -Oh, yeah?
translation.zh: -我会让你今天过得很开心 -是吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Honestly. Yeah.
It's just that it's-- it's new for me.
translation.zh: 只是我…我没经历过这种事

translation.en: What is?
All of this. Letting someone penetrate my inner sanctum.
translation.zh: 所有这一切 让一个人再次进入我的内部圣地

translation.en: I call my flower inner sanctum.
Wow, that's so weird.
translation.zh: 天啊 这个叫法真奇怪

translation.en: That's what I call your pussy.
translation.zh: 我就是这么叫你的小洞洞的

translation.en: -George. -Hmm?
Can we invite some of these people tonight? Some of your friends?
translation.zh: 我们今晚能邀请一些人过来吗？ 你一些朋友？

translation.en: We could have a dinner and I could meet them. Like, who is this?
translation.zh: 我们可以一起吃晚餐 我就能认识她们了 这是谁？

translation.en: No. Sorry, no.
No, I have this work meeting tonight.
translation.zh: 不行 我今晚要开会

translation.en: It's the whole English department.
translation.zh: 英国部的所有人都要开会

translation.en: -On a Saturday? -[Skype call ringing]
-Yeah. -Oh, shit! That's my parents. I have to Skype my parents.
translation.zh: 该死！是我爸妈 我得跟我爸妈视频

translation.en: -You wanna talk to them? Oh, cool. -Yeah.
Hi, Mom. -Mae.
-Hi, Linda. -Oh, Georgina!
Oh, well, now don't look at me!
-I'm 3,000 years old. -[man laughing]
-No. -You two are just the vision
of beauty and youth, as per usual. How's cohabitation?
translation.zh: 美丽和青春的象征 你们的同居生活如何？

translation.en: -Oh, so great! -A bit of an adjustment.
Oh, Georgina, don't look at me.
I mean what I say.
[man] Hello, darling daughter!
Oh! Hello, George.
How lovely!
-Hi, Dad. How are you? -Ah, well,
translation.zh: -嗨 爸 你怎么样？ -那个

translation.en: madly in love with your mother, of course.
translation.zh: 我当然还是疯狂爱着你母亲

translation.en: Please stop. I'm a repulsive old witch.
translation.zh: 拜托别这么说了 我现在是个令人反感的老巫婆

translation.en: [Linda] So, Georgina, when are we going to meet you?
translation.zh: 乔治娜 我们什么时候能见见你？

translation.en: I think it's outrageous we haven't met you yet.
translation.zh: 我们到现在还没见面 真是天理难容

translation.en: -Well, you do live in Canada, so... -It's been three months, guys. Chill.
translation.zh: -你们住在加拿大 所以… -我们才交往三个月 你们冷静一点

translation.en: Oh, your mother and I moved in together after five days.
translation.zh: 你妈和我认识五天后就同居了

translation.en: -[Linda] It's true. -[Dad] We just knew.
Now, Mae,
your father and I want to know if you found a new
translation.zh: 我和你父亲想知道你是否找到了新的

translation.en: Narcotics Anonymous meeting.
A what meeting?
A what meeting?
Wait! Stop.
Mom, can you please stop dredging up the past? Please.
translation.zh: 妈 你能别提那些 陈芝麻烂谷子的事吗？拜托了

translation.en: Don't say "dredging." That's disgusting.
translation.zh: 别这么说嘛 这个说法好恶心

translation.en: All right, so, I'm off.
[Linda] I'm not saying I want to talk about the past,
translation.zh: 我也不想跟你说过去的事

translation.en: believe you me.
I just want to know that you're going to a regular meeting.
translation.zh: 我只想知道你有定期参加互助会

translation.en: I've been very busy. I've been moving in with George,
translation.zh: 我最近很忙 我刚跟乔治搬到一起

translation.en: -and I can't sleep these days. -You can't sleep?
-It's not a big deal. -[Linda] Oh, my God.
All right, I think...
I should just tell you. I think that's because you were four weeks premature.
translation.zh: 我还是得告诉你 我觉得那是因为你早产了四周

translation.en: -Was I? -You were in an incubator, sweetheart.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -亲爱的 你住过恒温箱

translation.en: It's why we're not close.
-Are we not close? -And now I have to go.
Find a regular meeting.
translation.zh: 找一个定期举办活动的互助会

translation.en: Yeah. Bye.
So, I just found out I'm super premature--
You're in Narcotics Anonymous?
translation.zh: 你参加了戒毒无名互助会？

translation.en: It's really not a big deal. I've been sober for ages.
translation.zh: 这真没什么大不了的 我已经戒毒很久了

translation.en: I don't want to talk about it anymore.
I just wanna enjoy being in this beautiful furniture store with you.
translation.zh: 我只想跟你好好逛这家美丽的家具店

translation.en: Oh, I'm gonna get this one.
Mae, that is fucking massive.
Yeah.
No. Look, just get this one, OK?
translation.zh: 不行 瞧 就买这个 好吗？

translation.en: Oh, cool. Thanks.
So-- Okay, tell me, what is ages sober?
translation.zh: 所以…好吧 告诉我 你戒毒很久是多久？

translation.en: Like, six years? Six months?
-A week? -Yes.
Yes? Yes, what?
-Why won't you talk to me? -I am talking to you.
translation.zh: -你为什么不肯跟我说话？ -我就在跟你说话啊

translation.en: Okay, look.
I don't know if this is new information to you
translation.zh: 我不知道你有没有听说过这件事

translation.en: or if this is something that you're aware of already, but...
translation.zh: 或者你是否已经知道了 但是…

translation.en: you have the number one best face I've ever seen in real life.
translation.zh: 你是我这辈子在现实生活里 见过的最好看的人

translation.en: Mae, thank you. That's really kind,
but you say that every day.
'Cause it's true.
I've seen them in films, but not like this.
translation.zh: 我在电影里也见过长得好看的人 但都没你好看

translation.en: -It's like milk. You're a milkmaid. -Stop.
translation.zh: -你的美就像牛奶 你就是挤奶工 -行了

translation.en: Mae, stop it. Should I be worried?
translation.zh: 梅 别说了 我用不用担心？

translation.en: No.
-Honestly, it's very old news. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -真的 那都是老掉牙的事了 -是吗？

translation.en: There's so much stuff I didn't know about you when we moved in together,
translation.zh: 我们搬到一起时 我也不怎么了解你呢

translation.en: and I'm having to adjust. Like, I had no idea that you have a mug
translation.zh: 我也得适应 我都不知道你有个

translation.en: that says, "I heart Guernsey" on it. Is that true?
translation.zh: 上面写着“我喜欢根西”的马克杯 真的吗？

translation.en: Do you heart Guernsey?
What even is a Guernsey?
It's making me question everything.
Mae, I love you.
So please find a meeting, so I can relax.
translation.zh: 拜托你一定找个互助会 这样我就放心了

translation.en: Yeah, if you love me, I'll go right now.
translation.zh: 好 如果你爱我 我现在就去

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah.
-On one condition. -Okay.
I'm gonna get this wardrobe.
My name is David and I'm an addict.
translation.zh: 我叫大卫 我是个瘾君子

translation.en: [all] Hi, David.
First up on the agenda today,
happy birthday to Karen.
Karen let us know last week that it was going to be her birthday,
translation.zh: 凯伦上周告诉我们她这周过生日

translation.en: so we wish you a joyous and a sober day.
translation.zh: 所以我们祝你今天愉快 不沾毒品

translation.en: And I brought in some of my deviled eggs as a snack.
translation.zh: 我还带了一些自制的芥末蘸蛋 给大家当零食

translation.en: Second of all, a warm welcome to any newcomers.
translation.zh: 第二件事 我们热情欢迎新来的人

translation.en: Hi, I'm Mae.
I'm Mae. I'm an addict.
translation.zh: 我是梅 我是个瘾君子

translation.en: -[all] Hi, Mae. -Welcome, Mae.
Does anyone want to share?
[Karen] David, I'd like to start.
My name is Karen and I'm an addict.
translation.zh: 我叫凯伦 我是个瘾君子

translation.en: [all] Hi, Karen.
First up, I'd like to come clean.
translation.zh: 首先 我得坦白一件事

translation.en: It's not my birthday. I don't know why I said that.
translation.zh: 今天不是我的生日 我都不知道自己为何那么说

translation.en: -Anyway... -Is there coffee?
Just eggs.
Yes, Mae has something to share.
translation.zh: 好的 梅要跟我们分享

translation.en: Oh. No, no.
I don't-- I don't think I really need to be here.
translation.zh: 我觉得…我觉得我真没必要在这里

translation.en: Yeah. You seem like a really fun crew,
translation.zh: 对 你们看起来都很有趣

translation.en: but I've been clean a long time.
And I think, for me, the main problem is that I was very premature.
translation.zh: 我认为我最主要的问题是 我是个早产儿

translation.en: I was actually in an incubator.
Anyway, I hate eggs.
[David] What do we say to newcomers, guys?
translation.zh: 各位 我们对新来的人会说什么？

translation.en: [all] Keep coming back. It works.
translation.zh: 一定要回来 这方法管用的

translation.en: Hey, are you all right?
Yeah, I'm fine. I'm just premature.
translation.zh: 我没事 我只是早产儿

translation.en: It is so boring in there, isn't it? I can't bear it either.
translation.zh: 里面很无聊 对吧？我也受不了

translation.en: I just hate eggs! You know what I mean?
translation.zh: 我就是讨厌鸡蛋？你懂我吗？

translation.en: So do I! They're loathsome. I call them the devil's orbs.
translation.zh: 我也是！那东西太讨厌了 我称之为“魔鬼的睾丸”

translation.en: That's funny.
Can I get you a coffee? You need a coffee?
translation.zh: 我能给你冲杯咖啡吗？ 你需要咖啡吗？

translation.en: I love coffee.
I find it so weird that it comes from beans.
translation.zh: 咖啡居然是从豆子里磨出来的 真奇怪

translation.en: Isn't that bizarre? [laughing]
-I'm Maggie. -I'm Mae.
Good to meet you.
This is actually the exit.
[Mae] Oh.
I want you to do something for me.
I want you to take your past and put it in a box. Have you done that?
translation.zh: 我希望你把过去 放到一个盒子里 你做过这种事吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Maggie] Now take that box
and throw it in the bin and flush that bin down the toilet.
translation.zh: 扔到垃圾桶里 然后把垃圾桶扔马桶里冲走

translation.en: Oh, man.
-Yeah, that's awesome. Yeah. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -好 这主意棒极了 好 -是啊

translation.en: -You know where my past is? -Where?
translation.zh: -你知道我的过去在哪吗？ -哪里？

translation.en: It's in a box, in a trench at the bottom of the ocean.
translation.zh: 在一个深埋在海沟底部的盒子里

translation.en: Only James Cameron has seen it.
translation.zh: 只有詹姆斯卡梅隆见过它

translation.en: Wow.
Oh, God. I'm sorry, but I've hated every single mouthful of that coffee
translation.zh: 老天 抱歉 但这杯咖啡太难喝了

translation.en: and I must do something about it now. Otherwise I will die!
translation.zh: 我必须做点什么 不然我会死的！

translation.en: I don't know why I come here.
translation.zh: 我不知道自己为何来这里

translation.en: You wanna know how to fix your brain?
translation.zh: 你想知道怎么治好自己的心病吗？

translation.en: Simple.
Just stay busy.
Never don't be doing something. Ever.
translation.zh: 永远在做事情 不要闲着

translation.en: I'm far too busy to think about drugs.
translation.zh: 我太忙了 都没时间想毒品

translation.en: So, do you have kids and stuff or...
I have hobbies.
I bake. I kayak.
translation.zh: 我烘焙 我划皮划艇

translation.en: I weave my own clothes on a loom.
translation.zh: 我在织布机上织自己的衣服

translation.en: Sometimes I just run to Kent.
translation.zh: 有时候我直接跑去肯特

translation.en: I've been clean for 12 years.
Oh, don't look at me like that, Ethan!
It just doesn't make sense to me. I just--
translation.zh: 我实在搞不懂 我就是…

translation.en: How can someone so clean and fresh be an ex-junkie?
translation.zh: 一个如此干净清新的人 之前怎么会吸毒呢？

translation.en: She smells like laundry.
It makes sense, man. I mean, her legs are always moving and her eyes are spooky.
translation.zh: 这说得通 她的腿总是停不下来 她的眼神也很诡异

translation.en: Yes, but you know about addicts 'cause you're from...
translation.zh: 对 但你也了解瘾君子的 因为你来自…

translation.en: Hollywood. I'm from Hollywood.
translation.zh: 好莱坞 我来自好莱坞

translation.en: -You gotta make her feel safe. -Mmm.
I don't know. Make this place more Canadian or something.
translation.zh: 我说不好 或许让这里更有 加拿大的氛围

translation.en: [George] Canada.
Yeah, I can do that.
Thanks.
I don't think we've ever had a proper conversation before.
translation.zh: 我们之前好像都没好好说过话

translation.en: Becoming friends. All right, up top!
translation.zh: 我们要成为朋友了 好了 击个掌！

translation.en: -Okay. -All right.
-Brunch on Thursday. -No, thank you.
translation.zh: -那周四一起吃早午餐吧 -不了 谢谢

translation.en: Friday?
I think you should take up capoeira. I'm sorry, but I really do.
translation.zh: 我觉得你该练练卡波埃拉 抱歉 但我真这么想

translation.en: Oh my God. You're like a prophet.
translation.zh: 我的天 你就像个先知

translation.en: Thank you so much. I gotta go, but I'm gonna call you.
translation.zh: 非常感谢你 我得走了 但我会打给你的

translation.en: Or... actually,
do you want to be my sponsor? I don't think I really need the meetings.
translation.zh: 你愿意当我的保证人吗？ 我真的不喜欢互助会

translation.en: -No. Neither do I. -But maybe we can
translation.zh: -是啊 我也不喜欢 -但或许我们能

translation.en: hang out and that would be the same thing?
translation.zh: 多相处一下 那样就跟互助会一样了？

translation.en: Yeah. Anytime. Night or day.
translation.zh: 好啊 随时 白天或晚上都可以

translation.en: And remember, throw your past in the bin and just...
translation.zh: 记住了 把你的过去扔到垃圾桶 然后

translation.en: -[both] Stay busy. -[laughing]
-Bye. -Yeah.
[George] Wait, what do you mean you're not going back?
translation.zh: 等一下 你说不去了是什么意思？

translation.en: I'm just not going back.
-They only had eggs. It was bullshit. -Oh.
translation.zh: -那里只有鸡蛋 真是太扯了 -是吗？

translation.en: Oh, wow. Yeah. That's so cool.
You're such a rebel. Mae, you're like James Dean.
translation.zh: 你真有反抗精神 梅 你就像詹姆斯迪恩

translation.en: Okay, but check it out. I got a sponsor.
translation.zh: 好吧 听好了 我找到了保证人

translation.en: I met this weird woman and she said I just need to stay busy instead.
translation.zh: 我认识了一个奇怪的女人 她说我只需让自己忙着就好

translation.en: Wait.
Do you actually think I look like James Dean?
translation.zh: 你真以为我长得像詹姆斯迪恩？

translation.en: Mae, I...
Isn't the first rule of these meetings
translation.zh: 参加互助会的第一条规则不就是

translation.en: accepting that you have a problem?
I had a problem and now I have you.
translation.zh: 我曾经有问题 但我现在有你

translation.en: You can't just have me. Okay? I don't just have you.
translation.zh: 你不能只有我 好吗？我也不只是有你

translation.en: I have work and I have my friends and I...
translation.zh: 我有工作 有朋友 我还…

translation.en: -Yeah. -[George] What?
What is that?
[exhales sharply] All right.
How come I've never met any of your friends?
translation.zh: 你怎么从来不介绍我认识你的朋友？

translation.en: She makes a good point.
I'm sorry, can we not have this conversation in front of Phil, please?
translation.zh: 对不起 但我们能别当着菲尔的面 讨论这个问题吗？

translation.en: I'm going to introduce you when I'm ready.
translation.zh: 我准备好之后会介绍你们认识的

translation.en: Okay? But this conversation is about you, actually.
translation.zh: 好吗？但我们的对话是关于你的

translation.en: Well, maybe I didn't tell you about it 'cause I didn't think you'd get it.
translation.zh: 或许我之所以没跟你说 是因为我觉得你不会理解

translation.en: We've had very different lives,
translation.zh: 我们有着截然不同的人生

translation.en: and you grew up, like, in a bag of feathers.
Oxford, actually. I grew up in Oxford. You ever heard of it?
translation.zh: 其实是牛津 我在牛津长大的 你听说过这个地方吗？

translation.en: Maybe I'd get it if you explained it, but you don't, okay? So I have to,
translation.zh: 或许你跟我好好解释一下我就会理解 但你没有 好吗？所以我必须

translation.en: like, root around in all of your stuff.
-You went through my stuff? -Yes!
It says here
that you wrote this in hospital.
translation.zh: 这里的东西都是你在医院写的

translation.en: And that you owe someone called "Ink Boy" $800.
translation.zh: 还写着你欠一个叫“墨水男孩”的人 800美元

translation.en: Oh, and what is this? Is this, like, a drugs hat?
translation.zh: 这又是什么？瘾君子会戴的帽子吗？

translation.en: Mae, where are you going?
Oh, my God.
I don't...
What the fuck was that?
New me.
New life.
I have everything under control.
Said every junkie ever.
-Oh, Mae, I... -[Mae sniffles]
God, why do you have to be so intense?
translation.zh: 老天 你怎么这么冲动？

translation.en: I am not...
intense.
I'm sorry.
So I'm jizzing, and I'm jizzing, and I'm jizzing.
translation.zh: 所以我就射啊射 不停地射

translation.en: I'm jizzing like a goddamn machine gun.
translation.zh: 我就像一把机关枪一样

translation.en: -Jizz, jizz, jizz! -[audience laughing]
Why did you book this terrible man?
translation.zh: 你为什么要请这个烂人？

translation.en: That's Pete.
People love Pete.
If they like him, they are not gonna like me.
translation.zh: 如果人们喜欢他 那他们肯定不会喜欢我

translation.en: Ah, well, you'd be surprised. People are mad.
translation.zh: 这可说不好 现在的人都很热情

translation.en: Yeah. Okay.
[Nick] You're up next.
Where you been in my life, baby?
What is this?
-Do you like it? It's my new gimmick. -[audience cheering]
translation.zh: 喜欢吗？这是我的新花招

translation.en: [Pete] Fuck yeah! I'm a fucking king! Whoo!
Hey.
Who's this guy?
♪ Slam your body down And wind it all around ♪
translation.zh: 狠狠摔到床上 让你的身体旋转

translation.en: ♪ If you want to be my lover... ♪
So Monday, Wednesday, Friday, I bring in my packed lunch.
translation.zh: 所以周一、周三和周五 我都自带午餐

translation.en: -I have my usual, which is... -Ham.
Ham. Then Tuesday, Thursday, I go into the cafeteria.
translation.zh: 火腿 然后周二和周四 我去餐厅吃午饭

translation.en: What do you think they're serving on both days
translation.zh: 你知道他们每周这两天

translation.en: this particular week?
-Ham? -[laughing] Ham!
So that's Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday.
Ham, ham, ham, ham, ham!
I'm seeing someone. Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我有约会对象

translation.en: Okay.
Well, I feel like a regular old ham head.
What's his name?
Um, Jonathan Crenshaw.
-Jonathan Crenshaw. -Yeah.
Well, you know. When the cat's away,
translation.zh: 要知道 老虎不在家

translation.en: the mice hit the town and... I don't remember the exact saying, but--
translation.zh: 猴子称大王 而且… 我想不出这话到底怎么说来着 但…

translation.en: -[new song starts] -Oh shit! This is me!
♪ One can have a dream, baby ♪
translation.zh: 宝贝 一个人可以拥有梦想

translation.en: ♪ Two can make that dream so true ♪
translation.zh: 两个人可以让梦想成真

translation.en: Fuck off, Jared!
♪ One can talk about being in love ♪
♪ Two can see how it really feels ♪
translation.zh: 但两个人才体会到爱情的真正滋味

translation.en: Hi.
Hi.
What do you wanna know?
Everything.
I got addicted to coke when I was a kid and my parents kicked me out.
translation.zh: 我小时候就对可卡因上瘾了 我父母把我扫地出门

translation.en: I sold drugs, I overdosed, I went to jail.
translation.zh: 我卖毒品 滥用毒品 还进过监狱

translation.en: I just really,
really want it to be over.
Okay.
-Really? -Yeah.
Cool.
Is there anything else we need to talk about?
translation.zh: 我们还有别的事需要聊吗？

translation.en: Like... did you wanna tell me about your friends and why--
translation.zh: 比如说…你要不要跟我说说 你的朋友 以及为何…

translation.en: Why don't you just go down on me?
translation.zh: 你为何不舔我的小妹妹？

translation.en: Okay, that sounds good. Yeah.
translation.zh: 好啊 这主意不错 好的
